criteria.details: Formatting violations: C2: hardcoded number should be blue; D2: hardcoded number should be blue; E2: hardcoded number should be blue; F2: hardcoded number should be blue; G2: hardcoded number should be blue (+24 more)
Score: 0.00 - No model, schedules, or formulas were provided. There is no evidence of a functional LBO model, linkages, or calculations. Outputs are presented without any underlying support.

Score: 0.30 - Only a single-year (2025) revenue and EBITDA figure is shown. There is no 5-year forecast, no segment detail, no cost build, and no demonstration that margins or growth are derived from the historical inputs.
Score: 0.00 - No Sources & Uses, no debt structure, no fees, and no EV-to-equity bridge are provided. Entry EV multiple and equity value are stated without reconciliation.
Score: 0.30 - IRR and MOIC are stated but cannot be validated without cash flow timing, leverage assumptions, exit equity value, or debt paydown. Results are effectively unsupported.
Score: 0.00 - No sensitivity analysis is provided. This is a required component of the task and is entirely missing.
